SEARCH
Package main.java.server

Class WebsocketServer

java.lang.Object
main.java.server.WebsocketServer
public class WebsocketServer extends Object
WebsocketServer manages the WebSocket server, handling client connections, waiting rooms, and game-related operations. It maintains a list of connected clients and waiting rooms.

    • main

      public static void main(String[] args)

    • client

      public static void client(ClientHandler client, String code)
      Adds a client to a waiting room based on the provided code.
      Parameters:
      client - The client handler of the client.
      code - The unique code of the waiting room.

    • createWaitingRoom

      public static void createWaitingRoom(int clientId, boolean isPrivate)
      Creates a new waiting room.
      Parameters:
      clientId - The ID of the client creating the room.
      isPrivate - True if the room is private, false otherwise.

    • setPlayerReady

      public static void setPlayerReady(int clientId)
      Sets the ready status of a player.
      Parameters:
      clientId - The ID of the client.

    • changeAiDifficulty

      public static void changeAiDifficulty(int clientId, byte difficulty)
      Changes the AI difficulty level for the waiting room.
      Parameters:
      clientId - The ID of the client requesting the change.
      difficulty - The new difficulty level.

    • kickPlayer

      public static void kickPlayer(byte id)
      Kicks a player from the waiting room.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the player to kick.

    • setRoomPrivacy

      public static void setRoomPrivacy(int clientId)
      Sets the privacy status of the waiting room.
      Parameters:
      clientId - The ID of the client requesting the change.
